pkgmetadata.longdescription: Intuitionistic Fuzzy Multi-Criteria Decision Making Methods // Implementation of two multi-criteria decision making methods (MCDM): Intuitionistic Fuzzy Synthetic Measure (IFSM) and Intuitionistic Fuzzy Technique for Order of Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution (IFTOPSIS) for intuitionistic fuzzy data sets for multi-criteria decision making problems. References describing the methods: Jefmaski (2020) doi:10.1007/978-3-030-52348-0_4; Jefmaski, Roszkowska, Kusterka-Jefmaska (2021) doi:10.3390/e23121636.
